Package org.opendaylight.protocol.framework

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ProtocolSession<T>
    Protocol Session represents the finite state machine in underlying protocol, including timers and its purpose is to create a connection between server and client.
    ReconnectStrategy
    Interface exposed by a reconnection strategy provider.
    ReconnectStrategyFactory
    Factory interface for creating new ReconnectStrategy instances.
    SessionListener<M,S extends ProtocolSession<?>,T extends TerminationReason>
    Listener that receives session state information.
    SessionListenerFactory<T extends SessionListener<?,?,?>>
    Factory for generating Session Listeners.
    SessionNegotiator<T extends ProtocolSession<?>>
    Session negotiator concepts.
    SessionNegotiatorFactory<M,S extends ProtocolSession<?>,L extends SessionListener<?,?,?>>
    A factory class creating SessionNegotiators.
    TerminationReason
    Marker interface for grouping session termination cause.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDispatcher<S extends ProtocolSession<?>,L extends SessionListener<?,?,?>>
    Dispatcher class for creating servers and clients.
    AbstractProtocolSession<M>  
    AbstractSessionNegotiator<M,S extends AbstractProtocolSession<?>>
    Abstract base class for session negotiators.
    NeverReconnectStrategy
    Utility ReconnectStrategy singleton, which will cause the reconnect process to always fail.
    ReconnectImmediatelyStrategy
    Utility ReconnectStrategy singleton, which will cause the reconnect process to immediately schedule a reconnection attempt.
    ServerTest  
    Session  
    SimpleByteToMessageDecoder  
    SimpleDispatcher  
    SimpleMessage  
    SimpleMessageToByteEncoder  
    SimpleSession  
    SimpleSessionListener
    Simple Session Listener that is notified about messages and changes in the session.
    SimpleSessionListenerFactory  
    SimpleSessionNegotiator  
    TimedReconnectStrategy
    Swiss army knife equivalent for reconnect strategies.
